name: Immersion (itch)
description:
The main character dives to the bottom of the ocean in search of a metaphorical treasure - an idea that he needs like oxygen. For this he is ready to fight with not only hostile inhabitants of depths but also with his own complexes and fears. Will the character be able to overcome his inner problems for the sake of the goal that can change his whole world view?  

If you would like to experience the full range of emotions and see an epic ending, complete the game to the very end, it is not long ;)

  • WASD or Arrows - move
  • Mouse - turn on/off the torch
